title: Sampler, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: cross, counted satin, and eyelet stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: The Lord's Prayer, The Apostle's Creed, the Ten Commandments and other religious verses set in compartments formed by columns and arches with a Sun at the top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: cross, counted satin, and eyelet stitches on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-104.
